name: Chill Gamer
description: Chill Gamer is a dedicated platform for gamers to discover and share insights about the latest games. Users can browse reviews, add their own ratings, and manage a personalized watchlist. With features like theme toggling and genre filtering, Chill Gamer ensures a tailored and engaging experience for all gaming enthusiasts.
challenges: It was challenging for me to implement sort and filter together

features.Game Reviews: Browse through a collection of user reviews for the latest games across multiple genres.
features.Add Review: Users can add their own reviews for games, and rate games based on their personal experience.
features.My Reviews: Users can view and manage their own reviews, including the ability to update or delete them.
features.My Watchlist: Add games to your personal watchlist and easily access your favorite ones.
features.Theme Toggle: Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable viewing experience.
features.Sort: Easily sort games by rating and year.
features.Responsive Design: Enjoy a seamless experience across all devices, from desktop to mobile.

futureImprovement: I aim to enhance the user experience by resolving the issue of images taking too long to load. Additionally, I plan to redesign the add and update game forms, as I'm not fully satisfied with their current appearance.

name: Discount Pro
description: The purpose of Discount Pro is to help users easily find and use discount coupons for popular e-commerce shops in Bangladesh. There are many e-commerce stores that provide various types of vouchers and coupon codes for discounts. Our application collects all available coupons from each store so that people can easily access discounts and save money.
challenges: I faced challenges in designing and implementing a user-friendly UI that effectively displays discount coupons. Despite the difficulties, I worked through the design iterations and created an interface that enhances user experience.

features.Coupon Listings: Explore a curated list of active discount coupons from various e-commerce platforms.
features.Search Functionality: Quickly find relevant discounts using the search feature.
features.One-click Coupon Copy: Easily copy coupon codes with a single click on the 'Copy Code' button.
features.Login & Register: Sign up or log in with email, password, or Google account.
features.Profile Updates: Update your profile name and image at any time.
features.Brand and Store Listings: Browse top e-commerce brands and stores offering discounts.
features.Responsive Design: Enjoy a mobile-friendly browsing experience on any device.

futureImprovement: I plan to add a backend to make the site dynamic, allowing for real-time updates and user interactions. Enhancing the UI for a more polished and intuitive design is also on the agenda, ensuring a seamless user experience. These improvements will make the site more engaging and functional.
